# Usage:
# num_ms_to_appear pos_y speed health
# First Wave
1000 540 1 3
5000 140 1 3
0 540 1 3
0 940 1 3
14000 740 2 3
0 340 2 3
5000 540 2 3
4000 140 2 3
0 540 2 3
0 940 2 3
# Second Wave
5000 540 1 5
5000 140 1 5
0 540 1 5
0 940 1 5
14000 740 2 5
0 340 2 5
5000 540 2 5
4000 140 2 5
0 540 2 5
0 940 2 5
# Third Wave
8000 540 3 6
